attributes.action: Stop the facebook pages: Cancer is funny cause people die and dead baby joke
attributes.additional_details:
this petition is to stop the facebook pages :Cancer is funny cause people die and dead baby joke.
we need at the most 2 million signatures to send off to the help centre at Facebook to take the pages down, and shut down the personal facebook's of the individuals running these pages. and stop the inhumane behavior.
once signing tell your friends to do it too.
